name: Urban
description: Andesia was the crucible for countless heroes and villains caught in the throes of seething rebellion and righteous excess.

name: Raid on Apex 7
description: This unbroken ring is a symbol of the discovery that shook the galaxy and changed the course of both human and Covenant destiny.

name: Escape from A.R.C.
description: Scientists flocked to this Forerunner excavation in search of new beginnings. What they unearthed will lead to their inevitable end.

name: Summit
description: The half-real spaces at the heart of Kamchatka slowly turn over the long march of eons

name: Array
description: Halo erased a hundred billion possibilities to destroy a single inevitability.

name: Breakout Arena
description: The broadcast of Breakout matches has proven immensely popular with the UNSC Infinity crew.

name: Coliseum
description: Forerunner Warrior-Servants tested themselves in this arena before facing the Flood.

name: Eden
description: Only now - years after the Human-Covenant War - do many Andesian citizens feel secure enough to return to the metroplex centers.

name: Empire
description: Military-industrial concerns that power the UNSC war machine are prime targets for Insurrection factions.

name: Fathom
description: The UNSC explores Beta Gabriel’s vast oceans in hopes of recovering wreckage hidden in the crushing depths.

name: Plaza
description: Promesa’s streets were no stranger to organized violence.

name: The Rig
description: Humanity’s ravenous engines of industry require salvaging vast amounts of rare metals from Meridian’s vitrified surface.

name: Glacier
description: Each of Halo's microclimates can be controlled with exacting precision.

name: Parallax
description: The Orion Arm of the galaxy teems with danger and opportunity.

name: Battle of Noctus
description: The Andesian government vowed to root the Insurrection from Noctus

name: Overgrowth
description: Nature has reclaimed this tomb of millions.

name: Riptide
description: The waters of this planet have receded
